function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of COVID-19 in the workplace due to inadequate workplace modifications and management","Impact":"Risk of infection and illness for employees and stakeholders, potential business disruption","Mitigation":"Implementing strict workplace protocols, regular sanitization, ventilation improvements","Technologies":"Contactless entry systems, air purification systems, occupancy monitoring technology","People":"Employees, stakeholders, visitors","Owner":"Employers, facility managers"},{"Description":"Lack of risk management and factors affecting implementation in the workplace","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to COVID-19 outbreaks, uncertainty about future workplace plans","Mitigation":"Developing comprehensive risk management strategies, addressing major implementation factors, creating flexible workplace plans","Technologies":"Risk assessment software, data analytics for identifying risk factors, virtual collaboration tools","People":"Top management, risk managers, organizational leaders","Owner":"Risk management team, organizational leaders"}]}
